main event: A civilian observed a round white object that turned bright orange as it disappeared, appearing to be suspended from a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 50 minutes.,The object was observed at an estimated altitude of 5000 to 8000 feet.,The wind conditions were SSW at 25 knots at 5000 feet.,There is uncertainty regarding the classification of the object; potential explanations include balloon, aircraft, or astronomical body.,The star Spica was noted but unlikely to be visible at the reported time.
sighted object: round white object turning bright orange
